parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>MP Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all mission event handlers of the given type which were added by [[addMissionEventHandler]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command also resets the Event Handler creation index to 0.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]] type </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]] "Loaded";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[removeMissionEventHandler]], [[addMissionEventHandler]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
